name: Escape From The Aquillus
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51 with the theme "every 10 seconds".

Art, animation, programming, design and development by Alex de la Cour.

Music and sound effects by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)

Reach the door at the end of each level while avoiding hazards and navigating the timed gravity reversal to progress.

Best played in full screen.

Movement: Left/Right Arrows or A/D

Jump: Space or K

Dash (when available): Left Control or J

Pause: Enter
